io.reinert.requestor.deferred

Interface Promise<F>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - The type of the fulfilled result
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GDeferredRequestPromise<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GDeferredRequest

    public interface Promise<F>
    Promise extension with Request related progresses.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R> Promise<R> downProgress(Callback<RequestProgress,R> onProgress)
      Register a ProgressCallback to monitor download progress.
      boolean isFulfilled()
      Informs if the promise has finished successfully.
      boolean isPending()
      Informs if the promise is still pending.
      boolean isRejected()
      Informs if the promise has been rejected.
      <R> Promise<R> then(Callback<F,R> onFulfilled)
      Register a FulFilledCallback so that when the Promise is fulfilled it is called.
      <R> Promise<R> then(Callback<F,R> onFulfilled, Callback<Throwable,R> onRejected)
      Register a FulFilledCallback and a RejectedCallback.
      <R> Promise<R> upProgress(Callback<RequestProgress,R> onProgress)
      Register a ProgressCallback to monitor upload progress.

    • Method Detail

      • isPending

        boolean isPending()
        Informs if the promise is still pending.
        Returns:
        true if is pending, false otherwise

      • isRejected

        boolean isRejected()
        Informs if the promise has been rejected.
        Returns:
        true if is rejected, false otherwise

      • isFulfilled

        boolean isFulfilled()
        Informs if the promise has finished successfully.
        Returns:
        true if is fulfilled, false otherwise

      • then

        <R> Promise<R> then(Callback<F,R> onFulfilled)
        Register a FulFilledCallback so that when the Promise is fulfilled it is called.

        You can register multiple callbacks by calling the method multiple times. The order of callback trigger is based on the order they are registered.

        Parameters:
        onFulfilled - The callback to be executed when the promise is fulfilled
        Returns:
        The promise returned from the callback

      • then

        <R> Promise<R> then(Callback<F,R> onFulfilled,
                  Callback<Throwable,R> onRejected)
        Register a FulFilledCallback and a RejectedCallback.

        You can register multiple callbacks by calling the method multiple times. The order of callback trigger is based on the order they are registered.

        Parameters:
        onFulfilled - The callback to be executed when the promise is fulfilled
        onRejected - The callback to be executed when the promise is rejected
        Returns:
        The promise returned from the callback

      • downProgress

        <R> Promise<R> downProgress(Callback<RequestProgress,R> onProgress)
        Register a ProgressCallback to monitor download progress.

        You can register multiple callbacks by calling the method multiple times. The order of callback trigger is based on the order they are registered.

        Parameters:
        onProgress - The callback to be executed when the promise is fulfilled
        Returns:
        The promise returned from the callback

      • upProgress

        <R> Promise<R> upProgress(Callback<RequestProgress,R> onProgress)
        Register a ProgressCallback to monitor upload progress.

        You can register multiple callbacks by calling the method multiple times. The order of callback trigger is based on the order they are registered.

        Parameters:
        onProgress - The callback to be executed when the promise is fulfilled
        Returns:
        The promise returned from the callback
